tasks.description: Improve error handling in _query_ollama to display user-friendly messages for 404 errors, e.g., 'Model not found. Check available models with ollama list'
Investigate and resolve tokenizer warning 'special_eos_id is not in special_eog_ids' for Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.3
